remarks: Transfer a commutative law to the function operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofref.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofref.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
caofcom.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofcom.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x R y ) = ( y R x ) ) $.
caofcom $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( G oF R F ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
